sentence: The committee also subpoenaed Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate and state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), Arizona GOP chairwoman Kelli Ward, former Michigan Republican State Committee chairwoman Laura Cox and Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem (R), who is also a member of the far-right militia group the Oath Keepers.

title: Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Trump Campaign Officials Over Fake Electors Scheme

sentence: Lou Barletta, a former congressman and one of two front-runners in the race, has said he would sign any bill that comes to my desk that would protect the life of the unborn.? Another top candidate, Doug Mastriano, said in a recent debate that he was opposed to any exceptions for rape, incest or the health of the mother in an abortion ban.
title: Midterms Biggest Abortion Battleground: Pennsylvania

sentence: One of those bills, a six-week ban that would effectively block the majority of abortions, was introduced in the state Senate by Doug Mastriano, a candidate endorsed by former President Trump who is leading the field heading into Tuesdays Republican gubernatorial primary.

title: Pennsylvania governors race could have outsize impact on abortion access

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Republican voters united behind a nominee for governor, Doug Mastriano, who helped lead the brazen effort to overturn the states 2020 election and chartered buses to the rally before the Capitol riot, and who has since promoted a constitutionally impossible effort to decertify President Bidens victory in his state.
title: Midterm Stakes Grow Clearer: Election Deniers Will Be on Many Ballots
